  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120819</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120819</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Število rež na  milimeter pri uklonski mrežici</string>
            <string language="en">Number of slits per millimeter in diffraction grating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahl der Schlitze pro Millimeter im optischen 
Raster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nombre de fentes par millimètre dans le réseau 
de diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Número das réguas por o milímetro no grating de
diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Numero di fessure per il millimetro nel reticolo 
di diffrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριθμός σχισμών ανά χιλιοστόμετρο στο κιγκλίδωμα 
διάθλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Número de rajas por milímetro en la rejilla de 
difracción</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv valovne dolžine svetlobe na uklon in uklon bele svetlobe - mavrica.</string>
            <string language="en">The effect of wavelength of light on angle of diffraction. Diffraction of white light to get rainbow.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uklon</string>
            <string language="en">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mavrica</string>
            <string language="en">rainbow</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Effekt der Wellenlänge des Lichtes auf Winkel
der Beugung. Beugung des weißen Lichtes, zum des Regenbogens zu
erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet de la longueur d'onde de la lumière sur 
l'angle de la diffraction. Diffraction de la lumière blanche 
pour obtenir l'arc-en-ciel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito do wavelength da luz no ângulo do 
diffraction. Diffraction da luz branca para começar o 
arco-íris.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto della lunghezza d'onda di luce 
sull'angolo di diffrazione. Diffrazione di luce bianca per 
ottenere Rainbow.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση του μήκους κύματος του φωτός στη γωνία της
διάθλασης. Διάθλαση του άσπρου φωτός για να πάρει το 
ουράνιο τόξο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto de la longitud de onda de la luz en el 
ángulo de la difracción. Difracción de la luz blanca para 
conseguir el arco iris.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beugung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regenbogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arc-en-ciel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arco-íris</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diffrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rainbow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάθλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ουράνιο τόξο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">difracción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arco iris</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
